content:
Hey @docwilmot when you find some time, can you please add dependencies[] = system (<1.14) to the .info files of https://github.com/backdrop-contrib/flexible_template and https://github.com/backdrop-contrib/flexible_layout and cut some new releases? Might be a good idea to update the README files to state that this feature is included in Backdrop core after v1.14.0 :wink: ...let me know if you're OK with me to do that if you don't have time or simply can't be bothered :sweat_smile:

backdrop-contrib/flexible_template
This is a stub template required by the Flexible Layout module. - backdrop-contrib/flexible_template
backdrop-contrib/flexible_layout
Provides a layout with configurable rows, columns and regions. - backdrop-contrib/flexible_layout
